<JD_START>
Job Title: School Maintenance- Night Shift

Location: Bellwood, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Education, Training

Description:
$24 - $28

Amergis Healthcare Staffing is seeking a Custodian to perform a wide range of custodial and maintenance duties in order to provide clean, orderly and safe environment. They are responsible for maintaining the overall cleanliness of an area(s).

Responsibilities:

Follows established practices to properly clean and sanitize restrooms Ensures restrooms are stocked with proper toiletries and products Assists with inventory control of products Performs routine cleaning that involves, dusting, mopping, sweeping, vacuuming, carpet shampooing throughout facility Follows appropriate guidelines in the handling of cleaning chemicals and/or supplies Ensures that entrances to buildings/doors are securely locked when appropriate Performs random checks on facility doors/windows when facilities not in use Responsible for the reporting of unauthorized individuals within facilities/buildings to proper personnel Repairs and maintains power equipment and hand tools such as vacuums, buffers, pressure washers, etc. Performs minor maintenance as applicable Properly cleans floors and applies floor sealer as needed Routinely empties wastebaskets and ash trays Handles and properly disposes recycled materials Follows and enforces policies and procedures such as OSHA and safety regulations and guidelinesPerforms other duties as assigned/necessary 


Requirements

One (1) year of custodial experience preferred High school diploma preferred Ability to effectively elicit/provide information to and from appropriate individuals (including, but not limited to, supervisors, co-workers, clients) via strong communication skills; proficiency in the English language may be required Computer proficiency required Must be at least eighteen (18) years of age 


Benefits

At Amergis, we firmly believe that our employees are the heartbeat of our organization and we are happy to offer the following benefits:

Competitive pay & weekly paychecksHealth, dental, vision, and life insurance401(k) savings planAwards and recognition programs Benefit eligibility is dependent on employment status.


About Amergis

Amergis, formerly known as Maxim Healthcare Staffing, has served our clients and communities by connecting people to the work that matters since 1988. We provide meaningful opportunities to our extensive network of healthcare and school-based professionals, ready to work in any hospital, government facility, or school. Through partnership and innovation, Amergis creates unmatched staffing experiences to deliver the best workforce solutions.

Amergis is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

768913

Experience Level (if available): Internship
<JD_END>
